Package io.github.pirateducks.level.gameObjects

Class Fruit

java.lang.Object
io.github.pirateducks.level.GameObject
io.github.pirateducks.level.gameObjects.Fruit
public class Fruit
extends GameObject
Used to calculate an angle and fire a random fruit in that direction

  • Constructor Details

    • Fruit

      public Fruit​(float x, float y, float size, int select, LevelManager manager, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera camera, float angle)
      Create a new fruit
      Parameters:
      x - The starting x location of the fruit
      y - The starting y location of the fruit
      size - the size of the fruit
      select - which fruit to select
      manager - the LevelManager that the fruit are in (must be goodricke)
      camera - the camera for the level
      angle - The angle that the fruit will travel at
